availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: J. A. M. Foree (stub, jefferson county)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Married to Mildred Foree.

bibl.p:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, [State], Jefferson, Louisville, 1st Ward, p. 208. Find A Grave, "J. M. Foree (1831-1864)," Memorial #100874806
,https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=100874806&ref=acom (accessed July, 26, 2017). U. S. City Directories, 1822-1995, Ancestry, Louisville, Kentucky, 1861, p.91.
